title: How do I configure email settings?
answer:
Adding an email account 

 Go to the home screen and touch Email. An email account can be configured automatically or manually. 

 Manual setup: 

 1. On the Account setup screen, enter your email account name and password. 

 2. Touch Manual setup. 

 3. Touch pop3 to display the incoming server settings screen. 

 4. Touch Next to configure the outgoing server settings. 

 5. Touch Next to configure the email receiving settings, such as the inbox refresh frequency. 

 6. Touch Next to name the account and enter your name. 

 7. Touch Done to log in to your email and then access the inbox of the email account. 

 Auto setup: 

 You can automatically set up your email account for certain email service providers only when the email settings have been preconfigured on your phone. To automatically set up an email account, do as follows: 

 On the Account setup screen, enter your email account name and password. 

 Touch Next. 

 Touch Next to configure the email receiving settings, such as the inbox refresh frequency. 

 Touch Next to name the account and enter your name. 

 Touch Done to log in to your email and then access the inbox of the email account. 

 For details about email account settings, contact your email service provider. 

 Sending an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111074), enter the recipient, subject, and email content, and touch Sending email. 

 On the Inbox screen, touch an email to view it, or touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111075) to delete it. 

 Deleting an email account 

 [On the Inbox screen, touch the menu button. From the displayed option menu, choose Settings. Touch the email account you want to remove. Flick down to the bottom and touch Remove account.]()
